content.raw:
A diff of sensor data will most likely offer minimal insight. For example, what would the diff of camera images be? Raw sensor data could varying quite a lot between the real world and simulation, but the overall behavior could be the same.

Unless the real world test environment is rigorously controlled and accurately modeled in simulation, I don't think we can perform validation on raw sensor data. As a starting point, we should look at the overall system behavior. Steve's idea about comparing video would be good, and plotting would be useful to visualize and analyze important values.
